executive_summary: Implementation of Galaxy Defender as a pure HTML/JavaScript client-side game featuring a rocket ship that follows mouse cursor horizontally while avoiding asteroids and UFOs falling from the top of the screen. The game includes star collection for scoring, collision detection for game over, and progressive difficulty increase every 10 seconds.

tasks.description: Create HTML structure and basic styling
tasks.requirements: Set up the main HTML file with canvas element for game rendering, basic CSS styling for space theme, and responsive design
tasks.test_criteria: HTML file loads correctly, canvas is visible and properly sized, basic styling is applied

tasks.description: Implement game initialization and canvas setup
tasks.requirements: Initialize canvas context, set up game dimensions, create basic game loop structure with requestAnimationFrame
tasks.test_criteria: Canvas renders correctly, game loop runs smoothly at 60fps, basic game state management works

tasks.description: Create player rocket entity with mouse following
tasks.requirements: Implement rocket ship (🚀) that follows mouse cursor horizontally, constrain movement to canvas boundaries, render rocket on screen
tasks.test_criteria: Rocket appears on screen, follows mouse cursor smoothly in horizontal direction only, stays within canvas bounds

tasks.requirements: Create system to spawn asteroids (☄️), UFOs (🛸), and stars (⭐) from top of screen, make them fall at high speed, manage object lifecycle
tasks.test_criteria: Objects spawn randomly from top, fall down at appropriate speed, are removed when off-screen, different object types appear

tasks.requirements: Detect collisions between rocket and all falling objects, distinguish between good items (stars) and bad items (asteroids, UFOs)
tasks.test_criteria: Collisions are accurately detected, different collision types trigger appropriate responses, no false positives or negatives

tasks.description: Implement scoring system for star collection
tasks.requirements: Add 50 points when rocket collects a star, display current score on screen, update score in real-time
tasks.test_criteria: Score increases by 50 when star is collected, score is visible on screen, score persists throughout game session

tasks.description: Implement game over system for collision damage
tasks.requirements: Trigger immediate game over when rocket touches asteroid or UFO, display game over screen with final score, provide restart option
tasks.test_criteria: Game ends immediately on collision with bad objects, game over screen appears, final score is displayed, game can be restarted

tasks.requirements: Increase game speed every 10 seconds, make objects fall faster and spawn more frequently over time, track elapsed time
tasks.test_criteria: Game becomes noticeably harder every 10 seconds, speed increase is smooth and consistent, difficulty progression is balanced

tasks.description: Add game UI and visual polish
tasks.requirements: Display current score, elapsed time, game over screen, start screen, and visual effects for space theme
tasks.test_criteria: All UI elements are visible and functional, game has professional appearance, space theme is consistent throughout

tasks.requirements: Test all game mechanics, optimize performance, ensure cross-browser compatibility, fix any bugs
tasks.test_criteria: Game runs smoothly on different browsers, all features work as specified, no performance issues or bugs

file_structure.description: Simple client-side structure with HTML entry point, CSS styling, and JavaScript game logic
